sentence-with-footnote: "OpenStreetMap (OSM)****** is an initiative for crowdsourcing map information from users."
"One of the most prominent tools of OSM is JOSM******
column5: a graphical tool that allows users to (a) download all the spatial features (i.e. roads
column9: etc.) of a geographic area from OSM
column10: (b) visualize these features on a map overlay
column12: change or delete spatial features and (d) reload the changed dataset into the publicly accessible OSM map dataset."

sentence-with-footnote: "The system allows the selection of such categories from an existing list****** or the definition of new categories by the user."

column5: the proposed framework is implemented as a JOSM plugin******
column6: allowing the real-time and effective annotation of newly created spatial entities into OSM."

sentence-with-footnote: "We performed our evaluation on a subset of OSM data covering Athens
column6: which we exported through the Overpass API****** from OSM's site."
